ModMetaData.name: Research Assistants
ModMetaData.author: TheGoofyOne
ModMetaData.description:
Research Assistants
Version 1.1
Sometimes we need an assistant. I, honestly, would like a personal ball washer. But whatcha gonna do?
Adds four research assistants to the MISC menu to assist you in your research.
Adds a Tablet to slightly help with research, giving a 10% increase. ---Available after Micro Electronics research. Metallic Stuff - 100 Steel - 40 Plasteel - 20 Silver - 20 Gold - 10 Component Industrial - 10
Adds a Computer to better help with research, giving a 25% increase. ---Available after Micro Electronics and Sterile Materials research. Metallic Stuff - 150 Steel - 60 Plasteel - 60 Silver - 60 Gold - 30 Component Spacer - 2
Adds an Sub AI Computer to duplicate your efforts. ---Available after Multi Analyzer and Sterile Materials research. Metallic Stuff - 250 Steel - 120 Plasteel - 120 Silver - 120 Gold - 120 SubPersona Core - 2
Adds an AI Computer to double your efforts. ---Available after Multi Analyzer and Sterile Materials research. Metallic Stuff - 250 Steel - 120 Plasteel - 120 Silver - 120 Gold - 120 Persona Core - 1
These items do not research for you, they only increase the speed at which your researcher can research. :)
Version 1.0 - Release Version 1.1 - Added SubPersona Researcher to replace AI at 100%, and made Persona researcher at 200% with new graphics.
